attributes.action: Take Pakistan out of red list
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s been over a year most of the people didn’t see their parents because of lock down so it’s totally not fair.
attributes.background: Take the Pakistan out of red list or help people with hotel quarantine cost because it’s unaffordable.Most of the people visiting Pakistan for valid reasons and I think it’s not fair with them come back and pay huge amount of £1750 simply do quarantine at home for  10 days.
